description.@value: Jaggery Recipes, Sweet Recipes Sweet Potato & Rice flakes Lollipop

ingredients.@value: 2 to 3 Tea Spoon Pitambari Ruchiyana Jaggery Powder for caramel
4 to 5 Tea Spoon Pitambari Ruchiyana Jaggery Powder

nutrition.@value:
Serves: 2 People
                    Prep Time: 60mins
                    Cooking: 
                    Calories: 110
                    Difficulty: medium
                
                 Print

recipeInstructions.@value:
Boil sweet potatoes, peel it and grate it.

                                    Heat a pan. Add 2 Tea Spoon Pure Ghee in a pan.

                                    Add grated sweet potatoes,

                                    3 Tea spoon Pitambari Ruchiyana Jaggery Powder,

                                    1 small bowl rice flakes powder, 3 Tea spoon cashew powder,

                                    Half Tea spoon Nutmeg powder and stir well.

                                    Allow it to cook well. When mixture is ready allow it to cool down.

                                    Now take small portion of mixture and shape it like lollipop.

                                    Heat the pure ghee in another pan for deep frying.

                                    Deep fry lollipops.

                                    In another pan add 2-3 spoons of Pitambari Ruchiyana Jaggery powder and water and make caramel.

                                    Now pour caramel on each lollipop separately

                                    Put 2 to 3 pinch of roasted sesame seeds on it.

                                    Delicious Sweet Potato Lollipops are ready to eat.
